articles.description: BTC ETFs: +$44m, ETH ETFs: -$133m. ETH falls as Grayscale ETF outflows continue. ETH ETFs still see $1bn of daily volume. Liquidations hit $250m in sell-off. ETH Open Interest hits ATH at CME. BTC whales have bought $23bn in July. SOL weekly active addresses hits ATH. Bitstamp to distribute Mt. Gox BTC today. Russia to legalise crypto mining & payments. Lummis set to introduce BTC strategic reserve bill. Harris will not be at Bitcoin Nashville. BTC going to $52m by 2050: VanEck. Hashdex file for mixed BTC & ETH ETF. Coinbase to make tokenised treasuries fund. Polymarket partners with Moonpay for on-ramp. Ferrari accepts crypto in Europe. Bitfarms stopped in poison-pill strategy. Riot buys another miner for $93m.

articles.description: BTC ETFs: -$78m, ETH ETFs: +$107m. BTC falls amid ETF outflows & Mt. Gox movements. ETH ETFs see ‘very solid’ first day $107m inflows. Grayscale ETH trust sees $484m outflow. ETH ETF volumes come out at 23% of BTC. Debate about whether strong flows will continue. SOL DEX volume continues to rise above ETH. Harris may also speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Harris could be far more open to Bitcoin: Cuban. BTC symbol lights up Vegas Sphere. Coinbase continues to pursue Gensler emails. dYdX explores sale of derivatives tech. dYdX site recovers after DNS attack. JD to create Hong Kong stablecoin. Bitwise uses ENS addresses for ETH ETFs. BlackRock applies for ENA cash allocation. Uber CEO wants to accept BTC.

Mt Gox moves $2.8bn BTC for distributions. US government moves $4m BTC to Coinbase. Bedford FC buys $4.5m BTC. Hamilton Lane launches private credit fund on SOL. CNBC discusses BTC reserve currency rumour. Polymarket sets another trading record. BlockFi administrator submits plan to repay customers. WLD denies insider trading and manipulation claims. India keeps high crypto taxes unchanged. Gate exchange exits Japan. Marathon Digital fined $138m for breaching NDA. HyperLend launches lending on HyperLiquid.

Germany already lost $124m profit selling.

articles.description: What's the Meta? With the rise of Pumpdotfun and rug pulls becoming a daily occurrence, why do crypto degens keep investing? Do these investors enjoy being scammed? It appears that people very often invest in meme coins that are very obviously going to rug pull. Once it happens, they just laugh it off on Twitter, is being scammed fun?!

articles.description:
Meet Mikol: the Dare dev that doused himself in isopropyl alcohol and had fireworks shot at him. He instantly went up in flames and was rushed to hospital, where it became apparent he suffered third degree burns.

In this episode, Mikol reflects on the biggest night of his life, details his injuries, and the grueling recovery process he’s still in. Despite the traumatic incident, Mikol isn’t done with the project. Instead, he’s planning to build a decentralized app where community members can take on dares in exchange for DARE tokens.
articles.title: What's the Meta? Meet the Solana Dev Who Suffered Third Degree Burns to Pump a Token

articles.author: Scott Matherson
articles.description:
Economist and crypto trader, Alex Kruger has presented compelling arguments for why Bitcoin (BTC) should be viewed in a more positive light. The popular economist has emphasized the significance of holding Bitcoin, inadvertently encouraging investors to acquire the pioneer cryptocurrency as a safeguard against the devaluation of fiat currencies.
 
Bitcoin As A Hedge Against Dollar Devaluation
 
On July 24, Jedi from the YouTube channel, Blocmates Orange hosted an exclusive interview with Kruger and Rich Rines, a founding contributor of Core DAO. While speaking on the potential for a Bitcoin super cycle and deducing the cyclic halving events, Kruger also shed light on the importance of BTC as a hedge against United States Dollar (USD) devaluation. 
 
 
The economist argues that Bitcoin shou…
articles.title: Renowned Economist Alex Kruger Reveals Why Investors Should Buy Bitcoin

articles.author: Amitoj Singh
articles.description: Russia's lower house of the Federal Assembly, known as the State Duma, has passed two crypto-related laws on Tuesday, a Russia based policy expert told CoinDesk and Ria Novosti, Russia's state-owned domestic news agency reported.
articles.title: Russia Legalizes Crypto Mining and Brings an Experimental Regime

articles.author: Sergio Goschenko
articles.description: According to Nagel Paulino, head of the Central Bank’s regulatory department, the Central Bank of Brazil hopes to finalize cryptocurrency market regulations by 2025. The institution will conduct a second public consultation to finalize the drafts, hearing the opinions of market participants in order to tailor these rules to local needs. Central Bank of Brazil […]
articles.title: Central Bank of Brazil Aims to Finalize Crypto Exchange Regulation by Early 2025

articles.author: Jake Simmons
articles.description:
Lucie (@LucieSHIB), the marketing lead for the Shiba Inu project, has confirmed the launch of the closed beta for the Shiba Eternity Web3 version. The game, which is built on the Shibarium network, aims to bring the collectible card game into the web3 with its migration to the Shibarium Layer-2 blockchain.
 
Loyal Shiba Inu Community Gets Exclusive Access
 
The Shiba Inu marketing lead disclosed a statement by Angel from the Shiba Eternity team that the closed beta is slated for release “this week.” The early version is poised to offer an exclusive gaming experience to those who are part of the Shiba Inu token ecosystem. Access to the beta requires players to stake LEASH tokens which can be done through Shibaswap. This staking requirement not only gatekeeps the entry into the game but also…
articles.title: Shiba Inu Web3 Game Launches Closed Beta: How To Gain Early Access

articles.author: George Kaloudis
articles.description: Proposed legislation regarding a strategic reserve of bitcoin for the U.S. government poses far more questions than answers at the moment.
articles.title: The U.S. Government May Begin Hoarding Bitcoin, But How and Why?

articles.author: Matt  Stephenson, Ally Zach, Nick Zurick
articles.description: Pantera Capital’s compensation survey finds that, based on median base salaries, women earn 15% more than men. One possible explanation: they often have more experience than their male counterparts.
articles.title: Women in Crypto Earn More Than Men

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: The cryptocurrency market experienced a downturn on Tuesday, decreasing by 1.94% against the U.S. dollar, lowering the total market value to $2.38 trillion. Leading cryptocurrencies, including bitcoin, solana, binance coin, dogecoin, and cardano, faced losses. In contrast, ethereum, xrp, and toncoin achieved modest gains. Crypto Market Dips, Long Positions Lead to $134.65M in Liquidations Bitcoin […]
articles.title: Crypto Market Slump: Key Currencies Drop Amid Rising Trade Activity

articles.description: PRESS RELEASE. Nova Chain continues to make significant strides in the blockchain and digital content creation landscape. articles.author: Godspower Owie
articles.description:
Following his bold statement at the Bitcoin 2024 conference in Nashville, United States Presidential candidate and crypto advocate, Robert F. Kennedy Jr. has once again demonstrated his unwavering support for Bitcoin, emphasizing its importance in promoting financial freedom and economic resilience. His continued advocacy of the digital asset is evidence of his conviction in the revolutionary potential of cryptocurrencies.
 
Bitcoin To Drive Economic Recovery In The US
 
In the race to make Bitcoin a strategic reserve asset in the US, Kennedy Jr. asserted that Bitcoin would play a crucial role in restoring the nation’s economy. The presidential candidate made the daring statement in a recent interview with Coin Stories Podcast host Natalie Brunell.
 
 
Given his strong belief that Bitcoin …
articles.title: Bitcoin Will Play A Critical Role In Restoring US Economy, Kennedy Jr Says
